page.title: 20TIMES PAST-TIMES REMEMBERED
page.content: The earliest memory we found, was of 1910, when the first 'bus was driven from {Nailsworth}to {Avening.}A few years later this road was widened. This was a dramatic {EVENT}as cranes and bulldozers broke up the rock above Longford's Lake opposite Gatcombe Park now the home of{HRH Princess Anne.} In August 1950 seven skeletons were found in our top school playground which was being excavated to make it larger. One man put his pick through the skull of one of the skeletons. An expert said they were "sub-Roman" and prove that people lived in this { {VILLAGE}1500 years ago! In recent times Avening was flooded, even the{SCHOOL}did not escape the effects with desks floating in water. In 1979 a coach failed to stop at the bottom of Tetbury Hill and went straight through a wall.
